metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30547 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Out of bounds write in ANGLE in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.101allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform out of bounds memoryaccess via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
